aka: Wojtek: The Bear That Went to War

cast.name: 罗米·阿波拉菲娅 Romi Aboulafia
布耐恩·布莱塞得 Brian Blessed

this_title: Wojtek - The Bear That Went To War
trans_title: 佛伊泰克 - 去打仗的熊
Wojtek: The Bear That Went to War
introduction: This is the story of Wojtek the Bear - a magnificent 500lb bear who fought in World War Two alongside a band of Polish soldiers, shared their beer and cigarettes, and eventually their fate.Told by those that knew him and those that are captivated by his legend, his story captures the imagination and tells a very different war tale.
chinese_title: 佛伊泰克 - 去打仗的熊
foreign_title: Wojtek - The Bear That Went To War
